quagga.input.subject: FW: Access to the floor
quagga.input.xto: Anita DuPont, Shirley Crenshaw, Iris Mack
quagga.input.body:
Iris,

I think that your badge has  not been activated 
for the access to the floor after 7 p.m. or the weekends.

We shall take care of it.

Vince

---------------------- Forwarded by Vince J Kaminski/HOU/ECT on 03/06/2001 
08:22 AM ---------------------------
From: Iris Mack/ENRON@enronXgate on 03/05/2001 08:14 PM
To: Anita DuPont/NA/Enron@ENRON
cc: Vince J Kaminski/HOU/ECT@ECT 
Subject: FW: Access to the floor



 -----Original Message-----
From:  Mack, Iris  
Sent: Monday, March 05, 2001 8:08 PM
To: Crenshaw, Shirley
Subject: Access to the floor

Hi,

     Last nite after using the gym I tried to return to my cubicle to pick up 
my coat, brief case, etc.

     I was unable to get onto our floor.


     Is there a time-sensitive access for my badge?

     If so, can this be remedied.  I will be using the gym most nites and 
don't want to have to bring my gym bag home each nite.


Thanks,
Iris
